trans-unit.source: Azure API Management Policy Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure API Management Policy Reference

trans-unit.source: Learn about the policies available to configure API Management.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the policies available to configure API Management.

trans-unit.source: Azure API Management Policy Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure API Management Policy Reference

trans-unit.source: This section provides an index for the policies in the <link><linkText>API Management policy reference[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: This section provides an index for the policies in the <link><linkText>API Management policy reference[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For information on adding and configuring policies, see <link><linkText>Policies in API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For information on adding and configuring policies, see <link><linkText>Policies in API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Policy expressions can be used as attribute values or text values in any of the API Management policies, unless the policy specifies otherwise.

trans-unit.source: Some policies such as the <link><linkText>Control flow[]</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Set variable[]</linkText><title></title></link> policies are based on policy expressions.
trans-unit.target: Some policies such as the <link><linkText>Control flow[]</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Set variable[]</linkText><title></title></link> policies are based on policy expressions.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Advanced policies[]</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Policy expressions[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Advanced policies[]</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Policy expressions[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Policy reference index
trans-unit.target: Policy reference index

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Access restriction policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Access restriction policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Check HTTP header[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Check HTTP header[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Enforces existence and/or value of a HTTP Header.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Limit call rate[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Limit call rate[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Prevents API usage spikes by limiting calls and/or the bandwidth consumption rate.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Restrict caller IPs[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Restrict caller IPs[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Filters (allows/denies) calls from specific IP addresses and/or address ranges.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set usage quota[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set usage quota[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Allows you to enforce a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Validate JWT[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Validate JWT[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP Header or a specified query parameter.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Advanced policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Advanced policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Control flow[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the results of the evaluation of Boolean <link><linkText>expressions[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Control flow[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Conditionally applies policy statements based on the results of the evaluation of Boolean <link><linkText>expressions[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set variable[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Persist a value in a named <link><linkText>context[]</linkText><title></title></link> variable for later access.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set variable[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Persist a value in a named <link><linkText>context[]</linkText><title></title></link> variable for later access.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Authentication policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Authentication policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Authenticate with Basic[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Authenticate with Basic[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Authenticate with client certificate[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Authenticate with client certificate[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Authenticate with a backend service using client certificates.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Caching policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Caching policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Get from cache[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Get from cache[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Perform cache look up and return a valid cached response when available.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Store to cache[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Store to cache[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Caches response according to the specified cache control configuration.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Cross domain policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Cross domain policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Allow cross-domain calls[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Allow cross-domain calls[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Makes the API accessible from Adobe Flash and Microsoft Silverlight browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>CORS[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>CORS[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>JSONP[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>JSONP[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds JSON with padding (JSONP) support to an operation or an API to allow cross-domain calls from JavaScript browser-based clients.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Transformation policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Transformation policies[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Convert JSON to XML[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Convert JSON to XML[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts request or response body from JSON to XML.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Convert XML to JSON[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Convert XML to JSON[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts request or response body from XML to JSON.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Find and replace string in body[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Find and replace string in body[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with a different substring.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Mask URLs in content[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Mask URLs in content[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Re-writes (masks) links in the response body and in the location header so that they point to the equivalent link via the proxy.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set backend service[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set backend service[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Changes the backend service for an incoming request.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set body[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set body[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set HTTP header[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set HTTP header[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set query string parameter[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set query string parameter[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Adds, replaces value of, or deletes request query string parameter.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Rewrite URL[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Rewrite URL[]</linkText><title></title></link> - Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: For more information on policy expressions, see the following video.
trans-unit.target: For more information on policy expressions, see the following video.
